titleStmt.title: First, Great Britaines confession Second, Great Britaines intercession. Third, and the authours earnest desire for the Kings Majesties happy and speedy returne to his high court of Parliament.
titleStmt.author: Cragge, John, Gent.

notesStmt.note: John Cragge named as author in initial lines of third stanza.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
